name: clear-smog
effect: Inflicts regular damage. All of the target’s stat modifiers are reset to zero.
short_effect: Removes all of the target’s stat modifiers.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.
